content: Hi! I was about to commence a port of the https://www.drupal.org/project/video_embed_archive from Drupal 7, and did a pretty thorough checking that no one else had started on this, but wanted to check-in here in case anyone had done this already and it is just not on the Backdrop Contrib Github. Thanks!

well, its done now. https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/video_embed_archive

backdrop-contrib/video_embed_archive
Port of Video Embed Archive.org module. Contribute to backdrop-contrib/video_embed_archive development by creating an account on GitHub.

Hi @Eliza Olivares, that's great that you've done the port! One of the things you can do before you start is post issues in the Drupal issues and Backdrop-opts/contrib issues queue per here, which can help people discover if you're already working on a port (or, as now, have one completed).

Once you've created a release for your module, it should appear automatically on the Backdrop modules page.
@Eliza Olivares ++ thanks for porting that module :pray:
olivares** Props to you for all your hard work. (Karma: 1)

@bugfolder for sure! I did post an issue in the Drupal module; I needed the module ported on a rush for a client, so I figured asking here might illicit a faster response than posting to the Backdrop issue queue, after scouring and finding nothing anywhere on it. :D
